fields.headline: Tickets to ride
fields.bodyText: Six top destinations Hong Kong: £387 Emirates from Gatwick via Dubai. Valid for departures December 25-April 11. Minimum stay seven days, maximum two months. Travelbag (0870 8901460, travelbag.co.uk). New York: £199 American Airlines from Heathrow. Must be booked by December 5. Valid for departures until December 18. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Bridge the World (0870 4441716, bridgetheworld.com). Los Angeles: £257 American Airlines from Heathrow. Must be booked by December 5. Valid for departures until December 18. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Trailfinders (020-7937 5400, trailfinders.co.uk). Sydney: £629 Asiana from Heathrow via Seoul. Valid for departures February 3-March 31. Minimum stay three nights, maximum one year. Travelbag (0870 8901458, travelbag.co.uk). Amsterdam: £62.40 bmi British Midland from Heathrow. Must be booked online (£5 if booked by phone 0870 6070555). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. bmi British Midland (flybmi.com). Paris: £89 British Airways from Manchester. Must be booked online (£10 supplement by phone 0845 7733 377). Valid for departures indefinitely. British Airways (ba.com). The pick of the rest Faro: £59 Monarch Airlines charter from Gatwick. Departs November 17 for four nights. Avro (0870 0360116, avro.co.uk). Bangkok: £365 Qatar Airways from Heathrow via Doha. Valid for departures until December 12, then December 25-April 9. Mini-mum stay six days, maximum three months. Quest Travel (0870 4423513, questtravel.com). Nairobi: £375 SN Brussels Airlines via Brussels. Valid for departures until December 12. Minimum seven days, maximum two months. Thomas Cook Flights Direct (0870 7520066, thomascook.com). Vancouver: £292 KLM/Northwest Airlines from Heathrow, London City, Birmingham, Manchester, Bristol, Cardiff, Leeds/ Bradford, Norwich, Aberdeen, Edinburgh, Glasgow, Teesside or Humberside via Amsterdam. Must be booked by November 15. Valid for departures until December 14. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Trailfinders (020-7938 3939, trailfinders.co.uk). And the rail alternative Paris/Brussels: £59. Lille £49 Eurostar from Waterloo (£49/£39 from Ashford). Must be bought at least 14 days before departure, and must be booked by tomorrow. Valid for travel until December 15. Minimum stay one Saturday night or two other nights. Eurostar (08705 186186, eurostar.com).
